title: Workingman's Dead
text1: The fourth Grateful Dead studio album (1970).
text2: Highlights include Uncle John's Band, New Speedway Boogie, Casey Jones and Cumberland Blues.

title: American Beauty
text1: The fifth Grateful Dead studio album (1970).
text2: Highlights include Box of Rain, Friend of the Devil, Sugar Magnolia, Ripple, Brokedown Palace and Truckin'.

title: Wake of the Flood
text1: The sixth Grateful Dead studio album (1973).
text2: Highlights include Mississippi Half Step, Row Jimmy, Stella Blue, Eyes of the World and Let it Grow.

title: Blues for Allah
text1: The eighth Grateful Dead studio album (1975).
text2: Highlights include Crazy Fingers, The Music Never Stopped, Help on the Way and Franklin's Tower.

title: Terrapin Station
text1: The ninth Grateful Dead studio album (1977).
text2: Highlights include Estimated Prophet, Passenger, Samson & Delilah, Terrapin Station. 2004 bonus tracks: Peggy-O & Catfish John.

title: Shakedown Street
text1: The tenth Grateful Dead studio album (1978).
text2: Highlights include Shakedown Street, Fire on the Mountain, I Need a Miracle. Stagger Lee and All New Minglewood Blues.

title: In the Dark
text2: Highlights include Touch of Grey, Hell in a Bucket, West LA Fadeaway, Throwing Stones and Black Muddy River.

title: Built to Last
text1: The 13th and final Grateful Dead studio album (1989).
text2: Highlights include Foolish Heart, Just a Little Light, Victom or the Crime, Standing on the Moon and Picasso Moon.
